caption: This is a wonderful epic series clip. The background of it is in middle age. A diminutive man is holding a wine glass, actively engaged in conversation with another person. Meanwhile, an older man has joined them, and they are discussing something with very serious expressions. It appears to be a matter of great importance. In another location, a man and a woman are lying in bed together, embracing each other closely, suggesting a strong bond. The man seems to be some kind of leader or chieftain. On the same evening, by a campfire, two men are bidding farewell, with one of them displaying a deep reluctance to part. The following morning, in a palace, a girl is learning how to use a sword. She is facing a sword master, and he repeatedly strikes her sword, but the girl remains determined and continues with her training.
